oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stan Hitchcock Press Release
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hitchcock, Stan; Offset printing; Williams, Lois;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A black and white negative taped to and framed by a masking sheet advertising The Stan Hitchcock Show featuring Lois Williams. The press release describes Stan Hitchcock's childhood, time working at the Good Samaritan Boy's Ranch with his uncle, music career, songs recorded, and music partner Lois Williams. The negative would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.
